title: Mission Critical Systems
description: Developed, tested, and deployed mission-critical aviation systems as part of a compact team. Enhanced FAA system features, improved frontend performance, and provided on-call support. Gained broad experience across devops, embedded systems, web and mobile development using AWS, React, Swift, Python, Docker, and Java.

title: Blockchain
description: Specialized in smart contract development, dApp frontends, and Polkadot chains. Built full-stack blockchain applications using Solidity, WAGMI, ethers, and web3.js. Developed complete smart contract lifecycles from testing to mainnet deployment using Truffle, Ganache, and Hardhat.

title: Artificial Intelligence
description: Deployed and managed generative models for text, video, and audio using PyTorch, Cog, Diffusers, and Transformers. Fine-tuned NanoGPT models and developed MNIST benchmarking software. Contributed to production systems achieving 500k+ successful AI generations.
